title: Box Serverless
name: auth0-box-serverless
author: auth0
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will also remove the rule and the token endpoint.

auth0.scopes: read:clients delete:clients read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules

BOX_PUBLIC_KEY_ID.description: The ID of your Public Key in Box

BOX_SIGNING_CERT_PASSWORD.description: The password for your singing certificate (optional).

AUDIENCE.description: If you're using a client, then this is your Auth0 Client ID. For a Resource Server, you'll use the identifier (eg: urn:my-api)

SECRET.description: If you're using a client with HS256, then you would need to enter your Auth0 Client Secret here.
